macro_markets.query: What are the most important macroeconomic and stock market news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major index movements, Fed/central bank news, and significant company earnings or announcements.

items.title: US500 Index Rises to 6989 Points on February 2
items.summary: The S&P 500 (US500) gained 0.72% to close at 6989 points on February 2, 2026, amid broader market movements including a 1.07% rise in Nasdaq 100 to 25827. US stocks traded mostly lower on Monday due to sell-offs in speculative precious metals positions.

items.title: Kevin Warsh Nominated as Next Fed Chair
items.summary: President nominates Kevin Warsh as Federal Reserve chair, expected to focus on preventing global market spillovers amid rate cut pressures. The nomination supported the US dollar after it hit four-year lows and eased long-term yield spike risks.

items.title: Stocks End Unchanged Amid AI Investment Jitters
items.summary: US stocks closed little changed for the week despite a 1.7% intraday S&P 500 drop on Thursday due to concerns over AI investments, viewed as a reshuffling of winners rather than an end to the AI trade. Precious metals saw their biggest losses since the 1980s.

items.title: Upcoming Major Tech Earnings: Amazon, Alphabet, Microsoft
items.summary: Amazon, Alphabet, and Eli Lilly are set to report earnings this week, with previews also on Microsoft and Meta Platforms amid high valuations across markets. Investors urged caution as many assets trade at elevated levels.

items.title: S&P 500 Up 0.4% and Nasdaq Up 0.6% at Open
items.summary: Early market session saw S&P 500 rise 0.4% and Nasdaq advance 0.6%, following precious metals tumble after record highs. Broader commentary warns of repercussions from rising yields.

crypto_news.query: What are the most significant cryptocurrency and blockchain news from the past 24 hours? Include major price movements, regulatory news, and notable project developments.

items.title: Elon Musk Combines SpaceX and xAI in $1.25 Trillion Merger
items.summary: Elon Musk is merging SpaceX and xAI in a deal valuing the combined entity at $1.25 trillion, consolidating his artificial intelligence and space exploration ambitions.

items.title: Bitcoin Slumps to 10-Month Low Above $78,000
items.summary: Bitcoin prices have declined to a 10-month low, currently hovering above $78,000, with analysts discussing potential catalysts for recovery and long-term price targets.

items.title: Bitcoin Faces Continued Downward Pressure Despite Bullish Backdrop
items.summary: Despite positive economic data and bullish news, Bitcoin continues to struggle with negative market momentum and technical pressure.

items.title: Crypto Traders Warned of Potential Further Bitcoin Decline
items.summary: Technical analysts warn that Bitcoin's recent decline may not be over, identifying key support levels and price targets for traders to monitor.

items.title: Bitwise Analyst Maintains $1 Million Bitcoin Price Target
items.summary: Despite current weakness, Bitwise's head of research believes Bitcoin could reach $1 million within the next decade, citing long-term institutional adoption trends.

ai_news.query: What are the most important artificial intelligence and machine learning news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include new model releases, company announcements, research breakthroughs, and industry trends.

items.title: February 2026 AI Roundup: Multimodal Breakthroughs and Trillion-Parameter Models
items.summary: February 2026 is seeing major advances in multimodal and agentic AI, trillion-parameter models, digital twins, and significantly falling inference costs that are reshaping enterprise AI deployment.

items.title: Sony AI Presents Research on Scientific Hypothesis Evaluation and Creator-Focused AI at AAAI 2026
items.summary: Sony AI showcased work at AAAI 2026 focused on reliability, interpretability, and real-world performance, including research on reimagining how scientific hypotheses are evaluated and creator-focused methods for editing audio, video, and speech. The company has over 10 papers accepted at ICLR 2026 covering generative modeling, diffusion, and multimodal representation learning.

items.title: AI Security Crisis: MCP Vulnerabilities and Data Privacy Threats Surge
items.summary: January 2026 marked a turning point in AI security with a sharp increase in serious incidents, particularly Model Context Protocol (MCP) vulnerabilities that allow attackers to steal credentials and compromise AI agents. Data transfers to AI applications surged 93% in 2025, totaling over 18,000 terabytes, while 32% of organizations' security incidents in 2026 already involve generative AI tools.

items.title: AI Equity Crisis: High-Performance AI Becoming Inaccessible Due to Costs
items.summary: As AI becomes essential infrastructure like broadband, a new digital divide is emerging where high-performance AI is too expensive for students and casual users, raising concerns about equitable access to AI tools and the need for innovative pricing models.

items.title: Davos 2026: AI Adoption and Responsible Deployment Take Center Stage
items.summary: The World Economic Forum's 2026 Annual Meeting shifted focus from AGI speculation to practical narrow AI deployment, emphasizing responsible governance, measurable value delivery, and the critical challenge of AI adoption across organizations with cultural and contextual awareness.

gaming.query: What are the most notable video game and gaming industry news from the past 24 hours? Include game releases, announcements, esports, and industry developments.

items.title: The Division 2 Vendor Reset for February 3, 2026
items.summary: Content creator DJTICKLE shares a quick guide to the latest vendor reset in The Division 2, highlighting notable items like the Dark Winter SMG, Rainbow 511, and CMMG at various locations including the castle and Haven.

tech_news.query: What are the most important technology news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major product launches, company news, and significant tech industry developments. Exclude AI-specific news.

items.title: SpaceX Merges with xAI in $1.25 Trillion Deal
items.summary: Elon Musk is combining SpaceX and xAI, valuing the enlarged entity at $1.25 trillion to advance ambitions in space and AI computations potentially in orbit. The merger precedes a planned mega IPO.

items.title: Palantir Shares Rise on Strong Revenue Forecast
items.summary: Palantir Technologies shares increased in after-hours trading after issuing a revenue forecast significantly stronger than analyst expectations.

items.title: Nintendo Profits Disappoint Investors
items.summary: Nintendo reported profits that fell short of expectations, impacting its stock performance.

items.title: China Bans Hidden Car Door Handles for Safety
items.summary: China has outlawed hidden car door handles, a design popularized by Tesla, following several deadly incidents.

items.title: Global Tech Layoffs Reach Nearly 25,000 in January 2026
items.summary: Technology companies and startups worldwide cut 24,818 jobs in January amid cost pressures and redirection of spending to infrastructure, with Oracle reportedly planning up to 30,000 more layoffs.
